items.sentence: I still can\'t believe you didn\'t say anything.
The last time when I saw him, he was quite well.
Tom said it didn\'t take him so long to do that.
Tom spoke quietly so he wouldn\'t wake the baby.
Tom wasn\'t interested in talking about himself.
I bet we\'ll see Tom before the end of the week.
You can kill a man, but you can\'t kill an idea.
He worked hard in order to pass the examination.
Tom was kind enough to carry my suitcase for me.
Tom knows what would happen if he doesn\'t stay.
